mapper.select: SELECT i.ID,i.order_id as orderId,i.create_date as createDate, i.modify_date as modifyDate, i.stock,i.number, i.remainder_number as remainderNumber,i.WORTH,i.status,i.total_worth as totalWorth FROM IN_STOCK i WHERE i.status!='off' and i.stock = #{stockId} ORDER BY i.create_date ASC

SELECT i.ID,i.order_id as orderId,i.create_date as createDate, i.modify_date as modifyDate, i.stock,i.number, i.remainder_number as remainderNumber,i.WORTH,i.status,i.total_worth as totalWorth FROM IN_STOCK i WHERE i.ID = #{id}
SELECT i.order_id as id, sum(case when i.status=='off' then 0 else 1 end ) as totalNumber,sum(i.total_worth) as totalWorth FROM IN_STOCK i WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE IN_STOCK SET modify_date = #{modifyDate}, status='off' WHERE ID=#{id}

UPDATE IN_STOCK
order_id=#{orderId},
modify_date=#{modifyDate},
STOCK = #{stock},
remainder_number=#{remainderNumber},
total_worth =#{totalWorth},
NUMBER=#{number},
WORTH=#{worth},
status=#{status}
WHERE ID=#{id}
